result.eng: The attacks were apparently being planned by Osama Bin Laden's soldiers for several years.
result.ga: is cosúil go raibh na hionsaithe seo á mbeartú ag saighdiúirí osama bin laden le cúpla bliain
result.orig: is cosúil go raibh na hionsaithe seo á mbeartú ag saighdiúirí osama bin laden le cúpla bliain
result.html: is cosúil go raibh na hionsaithe seo á mbeartú ag saighdiúirí osama bin laden le cúpla bliainThe attacks were apparently being planned by Osama Bin Laden's soldiers for several years.
result.ponchtml: is cosúil go raiḃ na hionsaiṫe seo á mbeartú ag saiġdiúirí osama bin laden le cúpla bliainThe attacks were apparently being planned by Osama Bin Laden's soldiers for several years.

result.eng: He travelled to Afganistan in 1999 and accepted Osama Bin Laden's personal request that he would organize air attacks on America.
result.ga: thaistil sé chun na hafganastáine i 1999 agus ghlac le hiarratas pearsanta osama bin laden go n-eagródh sé ionsaithe aeir i meiriceá
result.orig: thaistil sé chun na hafganastáine i 1999 agus ghlac le hiarratas pearsanta osama bin laden go n-eagródh sé ionsaithe aeir i meiriceá
result.html: thaistil sé chun na hafganastáine i 1999 agus ghlac le hiarratas pearsanta osama bin laden go n-eagródh sé ionsaithe aeir i meiriceáHe travelled to Afganistan in 1999 and accepted Osama Bin Laden's personal request that he would organize air attacks on America.
result.ponchtml: ṫaistil sé ċun na hafganastáine i 1999 agus ġlac le hiarratas pearsanta osama bin laden go n-eagróḋ sé ionsaiṫe aeir i meiriceáHe travelled to Afganistan in 1999 and accepted Osama Bin Laden's personal request that he would organize air attacks on America.

result.eng: Osama Bin Laden and most of his soldiers are dead now.
result.ga: tá osama bin laden agus tromlach a shaighdiúirí marbh anois
result.orig: tá osama bin laden agus tromlach a shaighdiúirí marbh anois
result.html: tá osama bin laden agus tromlach a shaighdiúirí marbh anoisOsama Bin Laden and most of his soldiers are dead now.
result.ponchtml: tá osama bin laden agus tromlaċ a ẛaiġdiúirí marḃ anoisOsama Bin Laden and most of his soldiers are dead now.

result.eng: Maybe Bin Laden knew before he was killed by American special forces that he had changed the world utterly.
result.ga: b'fhéidir go raibh a fhios ag bin laden sular mharaigh fórsaí speisialta mheiriceá é gur athraigh sé an domhan as cuimse
result.orig: b'fhéidir go raibh a fhios ag bin laden sular mharaigh fórsaí speisialta mheiriceá é gur athraigh sé an domhan as cuimse
result.html: b'fhéidir go raibh a fhios ag bin laden sular mharaigh fórsaí speisialta mheiriceá é gur athraigh sé an domhan as cuimseMaybe Bin Laden knew before he was killed by American special forces that he had changed the world utterly.
result.ponchtml: b'ḟéidir go raiḃ a ḟios ag bin laden sular ṁaraiġ fórsaí speisialta ṁeiriceá é gur aṫraiġ sé an doṁan as cuimseMaybe Bin Laden knew before he was killed by American special forces that he had changed the world utterly.

result.eng: We live in a new world now, thanks to Bin Laden, Mohammed Atta and scores of others who are not there anymore to see it.
result.ga: táimid inár gcónaí i ndomhan nua anois a bhuíochas do bin laden mohammed atta agus na scórtha eile nach bhfuil ann níos mó chun é a fheiceáil
result.orig: táimid inár gcónaí i ndomhan nua anois a bhuíochas do bin laden mohammed atta agus na scórtha eile nach bhfuil ann níos mó chun é a fheiceáil
result.html: táimid inár gcónaí i ndomhan nua anois a bhuíochas do bin laden mohammed atta agus na scórtha eile nach bhfuil ann níos mó chun é a fheiceáilWe live in a new world now, thanks to Bin Laden, Mohammed Atta and scores of others who are not there anymore to see it.
result.ponchtml: táimid inár gcónaí i ndoṁan nua anois a ḃuíoċas do bin laden mohammed atta agus na scórṫa eile naċ ḃfuil ann níos mó ċun é a ḟeiceáilWe live in a new world now, thanks to Bin Laden, Mohammed Atta and scores of others who are not there anymore to see it.

result.eng: Osama Bin Laden would certainly be laughing.
result.ga: go cinnte bheadh osama bin laden ag gáirí
